DOC.brief_summary: The study elucidate effectiveness educational program prevention osteoporosis fracture . A random sample female population Southern Finland ( Uusimaa region ) within age group 60-70 year draw population registry . From 1996 2000 , 2181 woman population register recruit randomly assign intervention control group . The subject intervention group multidisciplinary program subject control group receive osteoporosis prevention information medium health care system . An end point fracture ten-year follow-up .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Educational Program Prevention Osteoporosis Fractures
DOC.criteria: Age 6070 year live southern Finland ( Uusimaa region )
